title: Another electric scooter goes up in flames in Tamil Nadu
description: Hosur resident Satish Kumar noticed his scooter suddenly catching fire from under the seat and jumped to safety. As the vehicle went up in flames, passersby rushed to his help in dousing the blaze. But the vehicle got gutted, police said. Satish had bought the electric two-wheeler last year.
